title: Science vs. Evolution - Vance Ferrell
description:
Over 3,000 scientific facts which annihilate evolutionary theory This book is based on extensive research and is highly recommended by scientists and educators

The Facts are on one side--The Theories are on the Other! This very readable 1000-page book is packed with thousands of Scientific Facts that disprove Evolution. It blows it away. Can be used as a source book for Ministers, Teachers, and Students, a Textbook for Home-scholars or group study as well as personal reading. Many charts and Illustrations. Good for school textbook and home study, academies, colleges, home scholar?s etc.


About the author:
Vance Ferrell was raised in San Francisco, Calif. He has been a very studious man who had 22 yrs of formal education. He received a BA in 1955 from Pacific Union College (Angwin, Calif.). 1965 he received a MA from the Potomac University in (Washington DC). In 1958 he received a BD from Andrews University (Berrien Springs, Mich.). Throughout the years Vance Ferrell has been in love with his Creator and compelled to defend a loving Heavenly Father. Vance Ferrell has spent much time doing extensive research in the fields of botany, biology, geology and other sciences
